name: SRMessagesUsageReport
desc: An object that describes the user’s Messages app activity over a period of time.

items.name: var duration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The duration that the report spans.

items.name: var totalIncomingMessages: Int
items.desc: The number of messages the user receives.

items.name: var totalOutgoingMessages: Int
items.desc: The number of messages the user sends.
